item.title: Twitter Updates for 2010-06-06
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• I'm at Lower Falls Wine Co. (2366 Washington St., Wellesley). #
  • I'm at City Feed and Supply (672 Centre Street, at Seaverns Avenue, Jamaica Plain). #
  • "Your language is offensive!" #
  • I'm at Bread and Chocolate (108 Madison Ave, Walnut St, Newton). #
  • I'm at Whole Foods Market (647 Washington St, Crafts St, Newtonville). #
  • ROTFL @ Adobe Photoshop crash reports: /via @bmf (via @aral) #
  • Rogues Gallery new store in Provincetown, MA - #
  • I'm at Le's Vietnamese Cuisine (300 Boylston Street, Chestnut Hill). #
